subject: Figure Skating
lead_paragraph: Tatsuki Machida of Japan upstaged the Olympic gold medalist Yuzuru Hanyu to finish first in the short program at the world championships in Saitama, Japan.
snippet: Tatsuki Machida of Japan upstaged the Olympic gold medalist Yuzuru Hanyu to finish first in the short program at the world championships in Saitama, Japan.
